mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT O.OPENSUB_CODE) FROM CLASS_MANAGEMENT C JOIN SUBAPPLY_DONE D ON(C.DONE_CODE = D.DONE_CODE) JOIN SUBJECT_APPLY A ON(A.SUBAPPLY_CODE = D.SUBAPPLY_CODE) JOIN OPEN_SUBJECT O ON(A.OPENSUB_CODE = O.OPENSUB_CODE) JOIN SUBJECT J ON(O.OPENSUB_CODE = J.SUB_CODE) JOIN PROFESSOR P ON(O.PROFESSOR_NO = P.PROFESSOR_NO) JOIN SDEPARTMENT E ON(P.PDEPT_CODE = E.SDEPT_CODE) JOIN GRADE G ON(G.CLASS_CODE = C.CLASS_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PROFESSOR_NO = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE G.MIDDLE_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND G.FINAL_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND G.WORK_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND G.ATTENDANCE_SCORE IS NOT NULL

SELECT O.OPENSUB_CODE, J.SUB_CODE, J.SUB_NAME, O.OPEN_YEAR, O.OPEN_SEMESTER, O.STUDENT_COUNT, O.PROFESSOR_NO, M.MEMBER_KNAME, E.SDEPT_NAME AS PDEPT_NAME FROM CLASS_MANAGEMENT C JOIN SUBAPPLY_DONE D ON(C.DONE_CODE = D.DONE_CODE) JOIN SUBJECT_APPLY A ON(A.SUBAPPLY_CODE = D.SUBAPPLY_CODE) JOIN OPEN_SUBJECT O ON(A.OPENSUB_CODE = O.OPENSUB_CODE) JOIN SUBJECT J ON(O.OPENSUB_CODE = J.SUB_CODE) JOIN PROFESSOR P ON(O.PROFESSOR_NO = P.PROFESSOR_NO) JOIN SDEPARTMENT E ON(P.PDEPT_CODE = E.SDEPT_CODE) JOIN GRADE G ON(G.CLASS_CODE = C.CLASS_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.PROFESSOR_NO = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE G.MIDDLE_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND G.FINAL_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND G.WORK_SCORE IS NOT NULL AND G.ATTENDANCE_SCORE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY O.OPENSUB_CODE, J.SUB_CODE, J.SUB_NAME, O.OPEN_YEAR, O.OPEN_SEMESTER, O.STUDENT_COUNT, O.PROFESSOR_NO, M.MEMBER_KNAME, E.SDEPT_NAME ORDER BY O.OPENSUB_CODE ASC
